search.query: |inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv| eval type="tactic"| rename Tactic as asset, TacticID as asset_id| fields type, asset, asset_id | append [|inputlookup df_analytic_detail.csv| eval type="analytic"| rename Summary as asset, AnalyticID as asset_id| fields type, asset, asset_id] | where type="$input_asset_type$"

|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv| eval type="tactic"| rename TacticID as asset_id | append [|inputlookup df_analytic_rating.csv| eval type="analytic"| rename AnalyticID as asset_id] | fields - TacticID Summary
| append [ stats count | eval type = "$input_asset_type$" | eval asset_id = "$input_asset$" | eval DetectionRating= "$input_detection$" | eval ResponseRating= "$input_response$" | eval SophisticationRating= "$input_sophistication$" | eval Comment= "$input_comment$" | eval temp_dt = now() | eval DateAdded = strftime(now(), "%Y-%m-%d") | fields - _raw _time count | table * | join type=outer [ |rest /services/authentication/current-context/context| fields username| where username!="splunk-system-user" | rename username AS Contact]]
| eval DetectionScore=case(DetectionRating=="No Visual", 0,DetectionRating=="Local Visual", 30, DetectionRating=="Central Visual", 60, DetectionRating=="Active Visual", 100) | eval ResponseScore=case(ResponseRating=="No Response", 0,ResponseRating=="Identification", 30, ResponseRating=="Response", 60, ResponseRating=="Identification and Response", 100) | eval SophisticationScore=case(SophisticationRating=="Novice", 0,SophisticationRating=="Practitioner", 30, SophisticationRating=="Expert", 60, SophisticationRating=="Innovator", 100)
| sort -temp_dt | dedup type, asset_id | fields - temp_dt | sort - DateAdded
| outputlookup df_scoring_temp.csv
| where test="nothing" | append [|inputlookup df_scoring_temp.csv ] | where type="tactic" | rename asset_id as TacticID | fields - type | table * |outputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv
| where test="nothing" | append [|inputlookup df_scoring_temp.csv ] | where type="analytic" | rename asset_id as AnalyticID | fields - type | table * |outputlookup df_analytic_rating.csv
| where test="nothing"| append [stats count | eval Summary="That $input_asset_type$ was updated successfully and is now reflected on the dashboard"] | table Summary
